data.name: ReadPaymentMethodType1
data.value: select PAYMNT_METH_TYP_ID, CODE, NAME, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_PMNT_METHD_TYP where DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @discontinueDate order by CODE

data.name: ReadPaymentMethodType2
data.value: select PAYMNT_METH_TYP_ID, CODE, NAME, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_PMNT_METHD_TYP order by CODE
